promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong elephant steel-type pokemon wearing a golden crystal headband. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or elephant. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Desertron, a a gigantic strong elephant steel-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Iron Cannon. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "elephant", "steel" or "Desertron". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, elephant-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: With a frame sturdy as armored walls, this colossal titan roams arid landscapes. Its Iron Cannon skill channels brutal force.
